column4: In bed >50% of the time. Capable of only limited self-care, confined to bed or chair more than 50% of waking hours.

Very sick, hospitalization indicated. Death not imminent.
column4: 100% bedridden. Completely disabled. Cannot carry on any self-care. Totally confined to bed or chair.
